column1: '''''The J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar 1975''''' was the official Tolkien calendar published by [[Ballantine Books]] in [[1974]]. It features art by [[Tim Kirk]] based on ''[[The Hobbit]]'' and ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.
